Package evaluators

Interface IEvaluationFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EvaluationFunction_Constant, EvaluationFunction_DeltaDistance, EvaluationFunction_Distance, EvaluationFunction_HandTunedOnState, EvaluationFunction_Random, EvaluationFunction_SqDistFromOther
    public interface IEvaluationFunction
    Generic evaluation of a node based on any factors. Going with "higher-is-better" interpretation of value. Primarily used by ISampler
    Author:
    Matt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IEvaluationFunction getCopy()
      Create a copy of this IEvaluationFunction.
      float getValue​(Node nodeToEvaluate)
      Determine and return the value of a node.
      java.lang.String getValueString​(Node nodeToEvaluate)
      Get a formatted string of the evaluated value of a node.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        float getValue​(Node nodeToEvaluate)
        Determine and return the value of a node. The methodology is determined by the implementation.
        Parameters:
        nodeToEvaluate - Node to determine the value of.
        Returns:
        Scalar value of the node, with higher being "better".

      • getValueString

        java.lang.String getValueString​(Node nodeToEvaluate)
        Get a formatted string of the evaluated value of a node. Typically this will divide the value up into whatever components go into it, making it easier to interpret and debug.
        Parameters:
        nodeToEvaluate - Node to determine the value of.
        Returns:
        A formatted string of calculated value components.

      • getCopy

        IEvaluationFunction getCopy()
        Create a copy of this IEvaluationFunction.
        Returns:
        A copy of this object.
